programme.title: The Past Hunters
programme.desc: Derek Acorahs The Past Hunters investigate Thackray Medical Museum, believed to one of Leeds most haunted buildings. Workers claim to have witnessed constant paranormal activity in the museum and one claim is that two Victorian ghosts are trapped inside of the location.

programme.title: The Past Hunters
programme.desc: The Drakelow Tunnels are a former underground military complexused mainly for storage. However, during the construction and running of this facility, 6 people are thought to have died. It is believed most of the hauntings that occur here are from the very people that died here.

programme.title: Rip Files
programme.desc: The R.I.P. Files features a group of paranormal investigators, who use intuitive abilities and a deep knowledge of metaphysical techniques to interact with the entities they encounter at haunted locations. They encourage the spirits to share their stories in their own words through amazing EVPs and other evidence that is bridging the gap between the worlds of science and spirituality.

programme.title: Rip Files
programme.desc: The R.I.P. Files features a group of paranormal investigators, who use intuitive abilities and a deep knowledge of metaphysical techniques to interact with the entities they encounter at haunted locations. They encourage the spirits to share their stories in their own words through amazing EVPs and other evidence that is bridging the gap between the worlds of science and spirituality.

programme.title: Travel Thru History
programme.desc: Get your kicks on Route 66 in Flagstaff, AZ. Duck and cover! Were headed to the famous Barringer meteor crater outside of town. Then we scan the stars for heavenly bodies at Lowell Observatory. Well learn the history of the region at the Northern Arizona History Museum, and finally swing from their many ponderosa pines at Flagstaff Extreme adventure park.

programme.title: Journeys in Africa
programme.desc: We elect to stay on a few extra days to try and obtain some good leopard footage. These are the most elusive of the "Big Twelve" and filming them is a major challenge. In the process of tracking leopards, we run across a newborn gazelle trying to walk for the first time. Will it succeed before the predators find it? Can we find and film a leopard up close?

programme.title: Journeys in Africa
programme.desc: One of the most modern cities in Africa, Cape Town has something for everyone. We explore the citys architecture, taste a little wine at nearby Vineyards and track down the only penguin species in Africa before reaching the fabled Cape of Good Hope…just a scenic drive outside the city proper.

programme.title: China Uncovered
programme.desc: Fashion designer Ji Cheng has shown her designs at London fashion week and, like beauty stylist A Zhi, is beginning to challenge the monopoly of Western brands in China. New levels of expendable income mean the wallets of the wealthy elite are helping fund this rising beauty scene and creating a market for luxury goods for shrewd businesswoman Felicity Feng. Expats from everywhere are trying to gain a foothold in this blossoming city, but can they handle its lightning speed?

programme.title: Travel Thru History
programme.desc: This episode we visit the bright lights of Vancouver, Canada. Well swing along the famous Capilano Suspension Bridge, get tranquil in Dr. Sun Yat Sens Chinese garden, learn about Captain Vancouver at the Vancouver Maritime Museum, dig up Cesna Em "The City Before the City" at the Museum of Vancouver, and dive into the citys seedy underbelly at the Police Museum.

programme.title: Travel Thru History
programme.desc: In this episode we explore Las Vegas lesser known past. We visit the National Atomic Testing museum to learn about how the desert outside of Vegas was used for testing Americas secret nuclear weapons. We also visit the Mormon Fort, the first permanent non-native settlement in the area, as well as the Neon Museum.

programme.title: Out Of Town Adventures
programme.desc: Outta Town Adventures travels both near and far to discover the best advenures the destinations have to offer. Season 1 visits attractions from California to Rwanda, Switzerland, Iceland, Utah, Zambia, Mexico, The Grand Canyon, Georgia (the Eastern European one) Louisiana, Hawaii, Mauritius and Seychelles. This TV series is dedicated to presenting history, culture and geography in a fun and pisitive way. It encourages people to explore this beautiful world - something that starts with simply getting out of town!

programme.title: Show Me Where You Live
programme.desc: Show me where you live is a documentary series that aims to answer the following question: How can human beings claim ownership to a space so that they can live safely within it, function as a society, and above all be in harmony with the environment around them? As we discover cultures and emblematic populations, we follow Philippe Simay who is at the heart of Inhabiting the World and represents its identity and originality. Philippe takes us on an epic adventure around the Human Habitat and sets the tone for the journey. As a humanist and philosopher, Philippe is a tireless surveyor of the city, and an explorer of living spaces. Determined to travel around the world, Philippe unveils how the populations that he encounters claim the space they occupy, shapes it and adjust to it. In this series of 20 films, of 26 minutes each, the habitat will be a major showcase revealing our capacity to adapt ourselves at a time where we need to find solutions in order to address immense changes.

programme.title: Show Me Where You Live

programme.title: Travel Quest
programme.desc: Bill Ball breaks the rules and stereo types of travel shows as he ventures beyond the highlights. What do you do after youve lead groups to over 140 countries and all 7 continents? Welcome to Bills bucket list on steroids... Travel Quest. This new, fast-paced series chases Bill around the globe as he seeks out anything but the mundane and ordinary—coming face-to-face with the largest crocodiles in the world, snorkeling with thousands of jellyfish, walking on the rim of an exploding volcano, feeding a group of sharks without a cage, bicycling across the Serengeti... this is not your typical travel show!

programme.title: New Frontier
programme.desc: Our seafaring nature has translated well to the space age, seeking to sail out into the unknown in search of riches of one kind or another. While Europe and Asia continue their interest in the resource rich Moon, The United States and NASA have set their sights on nothing less than manned missions to Mars. Can they manage to go shore to shore on the most dangerous of unknown seas, deep space.

programme.title: New Frontier
programme.desc: As the latest successes and failures come and go Mars continues to give up her secrets. Invisible clouds are revealed with ultraviolet light and the search for the source of methane continues with ExoMars. As we prepare to land humans on the red planet, getting there is one thing; staying long term is another, can we really conquor this planet?

programme.title: The Great Journey
programme.desc: 100 years ago, two young Argentine pilots, Eduardo Bradley and Angel Zuloaga, were the first men to cross the Andes Mountains through the air aboard a precarious balloon. They flew more than 8. 000 meters, from Santiago of Chile to Mendoza in Argentina. Relive the feelings and passions of two men who courageously pushed the bounds of flight in ways previously unimaginable. The first attempts to fly in early 1900 and how to fly today on the Andes mountain range.

programme.title: Wow, I Never Knew That!
programme.desc: It was the PURRRFECT idea for making our furry friends more pleasant around the house! Youll learn how KITTY LITTER clawed its way into our homes. And youll learn how a garment made out of special woven fibers can stop a bullet, plus, why is walking under a ladder bad luck? And finally, well CUT TO THE CHASE and explain the history behind this common phrase!

programme.title: Distant Shores
programme.desc: Series 9 of Distant Shores follows Paul and Sheryl Shard on a diverse voyage from England through the inland waterways of France to the Mediterranean Sea, an Atlantic crossing, and island-hopping in the Caribbean aboard their 49-foot sailboat, Distant Shores II. When they travel through France to arrive in the Med they sail to Gibraltar. From Gibraltar they enter the Atlantic Ocean stopping at the exotic port of Rabat on the west coast of Morocco, then head offshore to explore the Canary Islands before joining the Atlantic Rally for Cruisers (ARC) in Las Palmas for a 2,800 mile trans-atlantic passage to the Caribbean for Christmas celebrations.

programme.title: Diamond River Hunters
programme.desc: After constructing dirt roads and river crossings, access to the new mining site is completed. Warren and Konrad are first to the reach the hotspot and setup in prime position, but the equipment is not running properly. There is a confrontation between Gary and Peter on the way to the site about Garys reckless driving. The divers start to pump the river bank. The classifiers and jig are processing concentrate: bags are slowly being filled. However, there are constant breakdowns and stoppages as the team try to find a way to get the pumps primed and running at full power. They are desperately searching for solutions and have taken to repairing and modifying the equipment on site. This is starting to affect productivity and morale. A new plan is hatched to solve the pump problems: get larger and more powerful pumps. The divers are dispatched to fetch these from South Africa, but they are much to heavy for the trailers used to tow them. The trip back over the mountain passes is made even more dangerous because of the overloaded trailers. The new pumps are set up the next day, but they come with problems of their own. Jan, the equipment supplier, returns to find a solution to the pumping dilemma. He doesnt believe the machines can work at altitude. There is a confrontation between Jan and the miners. They take him to task about his lack of foresight and research. Warren has a close call when he breathes poisonous fumes while diving. Luckily Gary notices and pulls him from the water. Peter returns to the valley with a new plan to use the smaller pumps. Warren drives the TLB too close to Gary and endangers him by dropping big boulders while he is diving. Warren and Gary continue to aggravate each other and they get drunk and have a fistfight while at a nearby ski resort. Gary is badly beaten and injured. There is a lot of fallout when they return to the lodge. Garys jaw is in a bad way and there are fears it may be broken. Don and Konrad are concerned by Garys behaviour and debate his future at the mine.

programme.title: New Frontier
programme.desc: From the beginnings of our Solar System four and half billion years ago there remains tantalizing clues to its evolution; remnent debris: asteroids and comets. They vary in size from grains of dust to mountain sides, footballs to planetoids. They were the building blocks of the planets and perhaps carry the origins of life itself. Now within our grasp these rocks of ice and dust are ready to give up their secrets.

programme.title: Nomads
programme.desc: Follow breathtaking travel adventures of some well known athletes of extreme sports. Have a look at some stunning locations in Alaska, Mexico, Argentina, Japan, Tahiti, Africa, Costa Rica, Norway, Hawaii and whitewater kayaking, extreme big mountain skiing, windsurfing, kiteboarding, extreme snowboarding and big wave surfing that push the limits of possibility. The focus is on compelling personalities and great storytelling.

programme.title: Nomads
programme.desc: Tanner Hall is todays most influential skier. He has won every contest, he knows every trick and there is seemingly nothing he cannot do. An idol for some, a nemesis for others, Hall is no stranger to controversy.

programme.title: On the Cities Rooftops
programme.desc: How is life on the citys roofs? This series scales new heights, exploring apartment buildings, towers and monuments to discover a world full of unsuspected treasures : our rooftops. By day and night, the population changes on these heights. There are people who work here, people who live here, and others who come here to relax. The worlds rooftops are a continual hive of activity…

programme.title: Wild Australia with Ray Mears
programme.desc: Ray Mears explores the Great Barrier Reef starting on the Queensland mainland taking a boat out to Hervey Bay with whale expert Wally Franklin. They witness a mother hump back whale teaching her three month old calf the whale moves needed to survive the long migration to Antarctica.He flies out to Lady Elliot Island at the southernmost tip of the Great Barrier Reef where he goes scuba diving on the coral reef and discovers giant turtles and manta rays and shoals of big eyed trevelly fish.Back on the island Ray helps marine biologist Maggie ONeal plant a Pisonia tree and finds out how the Pisonia trees kill the Black Noddy birds that nest in them in order to use their corpses as a fertile compost given the unforgiving ground of a coral island.

programme.title: Creative Killers
programme.desc: Peppered across Africa are a few iconic locations that are renowned for killing action. Arenas bathed in a history of blood, places where Africas icons have hunted successfully for generations. Predators here develop unique and clever ways to hunt. But the circumstances arent the driving factor in this story. Sometimes these predators look for the perfect patch of ground to kill, a small area of long grass, or a single path that leads to the perfect ambush. How do they amplify their age-old skills by using the lie of the land? Savuti is big cat country. But only the most resourceful cats make it to the top.The Marsh Pride, Savutis resident lions, is faced with their toughest challenge this winter: Buffalo. The complicated mix of boggy marsh, open plains and dense woodland provide extra obstacles in their path to a meal. Over centuries these heavyweights have adapted their hunting strategy to Savutis every challenge and the buffalos every move. And their secret: The nighttime hunt. When the sun sets, the tables begin to turn and Savuti is at the prides mercy. But theres no shortage of challenges: Saba, the pride matriarch and most experienced hunter, has got to provide for her pride and keep them, and her territory, safe from two young male lions that are trespassing on Marsh Pride territory. It all seems doable until she gets injured after a run-in with hyenas… A lone female leopard is Savutis ultimate innovator. Her environment has forced her to change her hunting strategy and her prey, and shes thriving!We follow three characters through Savutis winter, starting with the disappearance of the small game and the arrival of the buffalo. The film looks at how our characters use the environment and features of the landscape to their advantage. We focus on the numerous challenges of Savuti - the things that make it such a hostile place for predators, and also highlight the inter-predatory battles between the Marsh Pride and the Nomads. We look at the challenges the young leopard is faced with while hunting under the lions radar and trying to survive in her non-leopard-friendly environment.

programme.title: Africas Deadliest
programme.desc: A national Geographic documentary looking into the deadliest animals that roam Africa. Examining animals that have evolved complex weapons from teeth to claws and agility so that they can protect themselves and battle effectively. From elephant tusks that can defend or attack to the fur, speed and agility of seals. Showing how these animals have exceptional skills and power alongside their body features that have developed into ideal tools for their needs.

programme.title: Wild Ones
programme.desc: Camouflaged cats. Some animals will never be inconspicuous, others blend so perfectly with their surroundings that they can move through them without detection. For many of the cats of Africa, camouflage is key to survival. From the spots of the cheetah, the rosettes of the leopard and the stripes and dots of the serval, these cats have evolved to merge with their habitat. Hidden lizards. Feeding on these harvester ants, is a beautifully adapted predator, the regal horned lizard. Merging perfectly with their surroundings these small reptiles live in the rocky, gravelly, desert like habitats of Arizona where they make a living almost exclusively on ants. Cryptic snakes. In the leaf litter of Australias woodlands and scrub hides one of its most cryptic and dangerous snakes – the death adder. The camouflaging patterns of snakes are mesmerizing – from the pearly multicolored sheen of the carpet python to the mottled bands of the death adder, snakes can be hidden right before our eyes. Shimmering cuttlefish . Many animals can hide and many can disguise themselves to some degree, but few can rival the camouflaging capabilities of the magnificent cuttlefish. Cuttlefish can not only change color, they can also change their shape as well as their texture as they morph through seamless variations of themselves.…. and concealed chameleons. Making camouflage an art form are the verdant sauntering highly distinctive chameleons that make their homes in rain forests, grasses, trees and bushes. There are well over 100 species of chameleon around today, ranging from the tiny pygmy chameleon to the prehistoric looking horned chameleon, most are found in Africa and Madagascar. Birds. In the frozen climbs of the northern hemisphere winter, ptarmigans blend against their snowy surroundings. Invisible spiders - Crab Spider. There is one tiny creature that has evolved a camouflage that is so perfect in its simplicity it is often overlooked by the casual human observer. Adapted to their hunting terrain the crab spiders that are found on bark and leaves are darker in coloration than those found on flowers which is the master of disguise?

programme.title: Wild Ones
programme.desc: The most venomous snake on land. The deserted heart of the Australian outback, where people seldom venture, is the hot, baked home of the most venomous land snake in the world - the inland taipan, a two meter long snake with enough venom in one bite to kill a quarter of a million mice. The rare envenomating lizard. Venom is not the exclusive domain of snakes and spiders. In the deserts of the south-west United States and the north west of Mexico lives the striking and venomous Gila Monster - the largest land lizard in North America. Blue ringed octopus. In the shallow waters of the Pacific Ocean is an animal the size of a golf ball that carries with it not one, but two types of venom. One is used on its main prey of crabs and is relatively harmless to humans, the other is used in defense and can kill an adult human in minutes. The tiny toxin wielding Red-backed spider. In secluded outhouses, under fences and letterboxes, under barbeques and amongst garden litter are the messy webs that hold the killing fields and the hundreds of offspring of a very deadly female. Tucked in the corner of her web the scarlet stripe of the red-back spider advertises her lethal capabilities. The feroci

programme.title: Blue Realm
programme.desc: Filmed using crystal clear High Definition technology, The Blue Realm takes the viewer on a fascinating and breath-taking journey of discovery beneath the waves to examine the unique biology and extraordinary behaviour of undersea animals. Filmed by expert divers with a passion for marine life and environment, the compelling stories and captivating creatures come from many locations around the world including Papua New Guinea, Palau, South Africa, the Red Sea, the Great Barrier Reef, the Bahamas, Cocos Island, British Columbia, Texas, Indonesia, the Socorro Archipelago, California and Florida.

programme.title: Blue Realm
programme.desc: Filmed using crystal clear High Definition technology, The Blue Realm takes the viewer on a fascinating and breath-taking journey of discovery beneath the waves to examine the unique biology and extraordinary behaviour of undersea animals. Filmed by expert divers with a passion for marine life and environment, the compelling stories and captivating creatures come from many locations around the world including Papua New Guinea, Palau, South Africa, the Red Sea, the Great Barrier Reef, the Bahamas, Cocos Island, British Columbia, Texas, Indonesia, the Socorro Archipelago, California and Florida.

programme.title: Wild Ones
programme.desc: The targeting Archer fish. Just below the surface of the water is one of natures most precise miniature hunters – the fabulous Archer fish. Able to shoot down their prey with targeted jet propelled water darts the archer fish is bulls-eye accurate. The ambushing Portia. A mere centimeter in length, the Portia spider is one of natures most capable and intelligent hunters. A formidable serial killer of other spiders, Portias are fast to learn and quick to adapt. The harpooning cone shell. In an ocean full of fast moving and agile fish, those that hunt them need sure fire methods of capture. So it is perhaps surprising that one of their most deadly adversaries, is a very slow moving snail. Weapon swinging Bolas Spiders. As the day comes to and darkness sets in, one of the worlds most deceptive hunters begins her nightly rituals. Dangling from the silken trapeze line she has just laid the female Bolas Spider spins a short silken thread punctuated with tiny globules and ending in one huge sticky silken bolas. Slave Making Ants. Running over almost every corner of the earth are millions and millions of tiny worker ants. Yet for some ant species, most of the workers are not their own blood. These are the slave makers trap laying Ant Lions. Throughout the sandy soils that blanket the earth there are hundreds of species of ants making a living on the land they find themselves. Yet there is one insect whose larvae makes a living on them – the one and a half centimeter, cunning, powerful, ferocious and often inconspicuous Ant lion Parasitic Pompilid wasps In the dunes of the Namib Desert is a little wasp that seeks out a very certain type of prey. Pompilid wasps, also known as spider wasps are named after the food they seek, and they are extremely good at seeking it.…which is the top of the micro predators?

programme.title: Cheetahs Of the Deep
programme.desc: The Canary Islands are sheltered by a mild climate, protected from any extremes of weather. But high up on the towering mountains, the conditions can turn treacherous. In winter, water is released by high altitude storms and fertilized by nutrients washed from the soil. As this drains into the sea the soupy waters around the islands attract a huge variety of life, draw in in from the vast Atlantic Ocean. Many whale and dolphin species congregate in these waters, but above all Short-finned pilot whales are found here in the vast numbers.Isora is the leader and matriarch of one of the largest resident pilot whale pods between Tenerife and La Gomera and we document her activities over a one year period. Several females and their offspring form the hard-core of this close-knit society where all the main family members are related to the mother. Males in the pod also play a role, but not in reproduction, as they are blood relatives. With their vow of chastity, they ensure the protection of newborns and juveniles - a long-term investment which is crucial for pod survival.Physical contact is important for the whales and the film reveals moving and rarely-seen interaction between the older pod members and the new arrivals. But this carefree innocence is undermined by harrowing footage of the effect plastic waste is having on the whales and other species. Large squid are the pilot whales preferred food source and the best feeding grounds lie a thousand metres deep. But they are masters of deep diving and are involved in titanic battles with the squid on daily basis.As the mothers give birth we examine the close bonds between the new arrivals and the pod, and how the whales deal with the tragic death of one of the calves.This film also looks at other whale and dolphin species which frequent the area, including the rarely seen Rissos dolphin, Brydes Whales and Atlantic Spotted Dolphins. Green sea turtles also frequent the area, attracted by the rich-sea grass beds which surround the islands.Filmed in stunning HD, this film delivers a comprehensive portrait of a unique and protected underwater haven, one of Europes last frontiers before the mysterious deep Atlantic takes hold.

programme.title: What In the World
programme.desc: Presented by Peadar King, this series illustrates the human consequences of global economic inequalities and human rights violations, by focusing on how people encounter these issues on a daily basis. At the heart of Africa, the Congo for many people will always be associated with Joseph Conrads early twentieth-century novel the Heart of Darkness, a title that has become a by-word for the country. And for Benjamin and David, two former child soldiers, and Funaha held as a sex slave by one of the many militias that continue to terrorise the country, that metaphor remains a daily reality. The film explores how this seemingly never-ending conflict impacts on the people of North Kivu.

programme.title: Music Voyager
programme.desc: Music Voyager is a music and travel broadcast series (television/cable, broadband, in-flight and mobile) that invites viewers to discover the exciting sounds of the planet. The host is Jacob Edgar, an explorer who does not search for lost cities or ancient ruins. Hes on the quest for a different kind of treasure…music. As an ethnomusicologist and world music record producer, Edgar travels the globe hunting for the best songs the world has to offer, and he suffers through some of the worst…so you dont have to. Along the way, hes rewarded with a backstage pass to concert halls, street festivals, recording studios and rehearsal rooms. With local musicians as his guide, Edgar tastes exotic and occasionally ghastly food, visits off-the-beaten path attractions and parties the night away to amazing concerts at hidden venues that only the locals know. Join music voyager for unexpected adventures and surprising discoveries that unveil the magic, mystery and music of far off lands.

programme.title: Close Quarter Battle
programme.desc: Ten years ago, thousands of US and Coalition forces personnel, ranging from elite soldiers to reservists, found themselves in the middle of two conﬂ icts that required an entirely diﬀ erent approach to warfare than they had previously experienced. From special forces units securing vital points of strategic interest and capturing key individuals in Afghanistan. This episode of CQB takes a close look at some of at how special operations were integrated into regular units and how they fought through many close quarter combat situations with a combination of intelligence, high-tech weaponry and surveillance technologies to ﬁ nd and capture Saddam Hussein.

programme.title: What In the World

programme.title: The Past Hunters
programme.desc: Derek Acorahs The Past Hunters travel to Hull to investigate ghostly goings on inside of a former chocolate factory. The investigation turns out to be no picnic, as the ghosts haunting make direct contact with the team.

programme.title: The Past Hunters
programme.desc: What stories lay buried beneath the surface, waiting to be revealed? 200 years on from Raffles landing, archaeologists are digging deep and unearthing new artefacts that reshape what we think we know about Singapore. From uncovering evidence of an ancient settlement, to discovering forgotten relics from the lives of people in colonial Singapore and World War 2, they are piecing together new evidence that will paint a story of Singapore over seven centuries. In this three-episode series, teams of archaeologists will look to the land and seas for clues to seek out these lost chapters of history that are forgotten by time, only to be uncovered today.

programme.title: Rip Files
programme.desc: The R.I.P. Files features a group of paranormal investigators, who use intuitive abilities and a deep knowledge of metaphysical techniques to interact with the entities they encounter at haunted locations. They encourage the spirits to share their stories in their own words through amazing EVPs and other evidence that is bridging the gap between the worlds of science and spirituality.

programme.title: Rip Files
programme.desc: The R.I.P. Files features a group of paranormal investigators, who use intuitive abilities and a deep knowledge of metaphysical techniques to interact with the entities they encounter at haunted locations. They encourage the spirits to share their stories in their own words through amazing EVPs and other evidence that is bridging the gap between the worlds of science and spirituality.

programme.title: Travel Thru History
programme.desc: Were headed upstate to Albany and Saratoga Springs. Well take the Albany capital tour and see five former NY governors who would become US Presidents. Then, well board the USS Slater and see how America defended its fleet against German U-boats in WWII. Well sample the mineral water in Saratoga Springs, and bet the farm at their famous thoroughbred raceway. Then, well learn how important the Battle of Saratoga was for Americas future at Saratoga battlefield.

programme.title: Journeys in Africa
programme.desc: One of the most modern cities in Africa, Cape Town has something for everyone. We explore the citys architecture, taste a little wine at nearby Vineyards and track down the only penguin species in Africa before reaching the fabled Cape of Good Hope…just a scenic drive outside the city proper.

programme.title: Journeys in Africa
programme.desc: Amboseli National Park has had several years of drought so were anxious to see if the famous elephant herds are healthy. Journeys takes to the air and ground to get a count of these incredible animals. Along the way, we visit the local Masai to see how theyre adjusting to encroaching civilization and we encounter buffalo, hippos and numerous bird species that make Amboseli so special.

programme.title: China Uncovered
programme.desc: Famous Chinese Erhu player Zhao Lei is leaving his stamp on classical Chinese music by experimenting with musical fusion between the East and West. On a sharper note in downtown Shanghai, Yuyintang Livehouse opens its doors to contemporary music lovers. The spiritual home of cutting edge beats in Shanghai, Yuyintang has started the careers of Visual Kei band Lilith and progressive metal rockers Mathlotus, but the modern music scene is still reeling from the Rock n Roll ban of the Cultural Revolution. Join them as they strive to become the rock stars of tomorrow.

programme.title: Travel Thru History
programme.desc: Weve got our own private Idaho in Boise. Well tour one of the most stunning buildings in the frontier west at the Idaho State Capitol, dance all night with the Basques at the Basque museum and cultural center, soar to new heights at the Warhawk Air Museum in Nampa, and get a shiver down our spines at the Idaho state penitentiary.

programme.title: Travel Thru History
programme.desc: Its island living in the Keys on this episode of TTH. We learn about the islands treasure hunting history at the Mel Fisher Museum. Then well explore Fort Jefferson, an isolated fort in the Gulf of Mexico that defended the islands. American literature enthusiasts will enjoy a look at Ernest Hemingways Key West home, where some of his most famous works were penned.

programme.title: Out Of Town Adventures
programme.desc: Outta Town Adventures travels both near and far to discover the best advenures the destinations have to offer. Season 1 visits attractions from California to Rwanda, Switzerland, Iceland, Utah, Zambia, Mexico, The Grand Canyon, Georgia (the Eastern European one) Louisiana, Hawaii, Mauritius and Seychelles. This TV series is dedicated to presenting history, culture and geography in a fun and pisitive way. It encourages people to explore this beautiful world - something that starts with simply getting out of town!

programme.title: Out Of Town Adventures

programme.title: Show Me Where You Live
programme.desc: Show me where you live is a documentary series that aims to answer the following question: How can human beings claim ownership to a space so that they can live safely within it, function as a society, and above all be in harmony with the environment around them? As we discover cultures and emblematic populations, we follow Philippe Simay who is at the heart of Inhabiting the World and represents its identity and originality. Philippe takes us on an epic adventure around the Human Habitat and sets the tone for the journey. As a humanist and philosopher, Philippe is a tireless surveyor of the city, and an explorer of living spaces. Determined to travel around the world, Philippe unveils how the populations that he encounters claim the space they occupy, shapes it and adjust to it. In this series of 20 films, of 26 minutes each, the habitat will be a major showcase revealing our capacity to adapt ourselves at a time where we need to find solutions in order to address immense changes.

programme.title: Travel Quest
programme.desc: Bill Ball breaks the rules and stereo types of travel shows as he ventures beyond the highlights. What do you do after youve lead groups to over 140 countries and all 7 continents? Welcome to Bills bucket list on steroids... Travel Quest. This new, fast-paced series chases Bill around the globe as he seeks out anything but the mundane and ordinary—coming face-to-face with the largest crocodiles in the world, snorkeling with thousands of jellyfish, walking on the rim of an exploding volcano, feeding a group of sharks without a cage, bicycling across the Serengeti... this is not your typical travel show!

programme.title: New Frontier
programme.desc: As the latest successes and failures come and go Mars continues to give up her secrets. Invisible clouds are revealed with ultraviolet light and the search for the source of methane continues with ExoMars. As we prepare to land humans on the red planet, getting there is one thing; staying long term is another, can we really conquor this planet?

programme.title: New Frontier
programme.desc: Our solar system is vast, from our own star the Sun to Earth is nearly 150 million kilometers or 1 Astronomical Unit. Jupiter is 5.2 AU distant and Pluto up to 48AU, the solar system extends far beyond this into interstellar space. We humans cannot yet travel that sort of distance, however w e can and do send our robots and probes in our place; and the results are astounding.

programme.title: The Great Journey
programme.desc: Over one hundred years ago, two young Argentinian daredevil pilots, Eduardo Bradley and Angel Zuloaga, decided to attempt the first hazardous crossing of the Andes aboard an unreliable balloon. Achieving an altitude of more than 8,000 metres, the pair managed to fly from Chile to Argentina. This docu-series chronicles their adventures and tries to recreate the same journey using the same technique and facing similar challenges.

programme.title: Wow, I Never Knew That!
programme.desc: Learn the secrets behind THERMOS amazing technology! And they were the sweet candy pellets we loved as a kid, but did you know that PEZ was created to help people stop smoking? And find out how a steamboat inspired SAMUEL LANGHORNE CLEMENS to change his name to MARK TWAIN!

programme.title: Distant Shores
programme.desc: Series 9 of Distant Shores follows Paul and Sheryl Shard on a diverse voyage from England through the inland waterways of France to the Mediterranean Sea, an Atlantic crossing, and island-hopping in the Caribbean aboard their 49-foot sailboat, Distant Shores II. When they travel through France to arrive in the Med they sail to Gibraltar. From Gibraltar they enter the Atlantic Ocean stopping at the exotic port of Rabat on the west coast of Morocco, then head offshore to explore the Canary Islands before joining the Atlantic Rally for Cruisers (ARC) in Las Palmas for a 2,800 mile trans-atlantic passage to the Caribbean for Christmas celebrations.

programme.title: Diamond River Hunters
programme.desc: The Operation is in its sixth week and the team is struggling to get both sets of machinery running simultaneously. They are isolated in every possible way and can only rely on themselves to solve the technical problems. Kim returns from a cancer treatment and has brought along his niece Kirsten. Mitch, an investor in the venture, has also joined them. The classifiers are becoming clogged with vegetation that is being pumped from the riverbanks. A risky decision is taken, and the vegetation is burnt off with petrol to save time. This backfires when John, the local foreman is almost badly burnt when petrol under the sand is ignited, and the classifier is almost destroyed. The rainy season begins and problems escalate. The team must devise new strategies to safe guard the equipment and prevent it from being washed away by the now daily thunderstorms. The miners struggle on in spite of the elements. Soon after the 1st period of prolonged rain there is a flash flood and mining has to be halted. Don is concerned by the backlog of bags that still need to be sorted. The sorting table is returned to the lodge and the team take turns sorting the stones, but with no luck. Don carries on sorting bags by himself, upset that no one is willing to go through the backlog. A decision is made to construct a bridge at the 1st river crossing so that the mining site can be accessed again. The massive undertaking is aided by the TLB, but it is back breaking work and the massive boulders have to be laid by hand in the river. As the bridge is almost completed, the river rises by 4 feet and most of it is washed away. The team are frustrated and they are cut off and isolated, losing more and more valuable mining time. Peter, Konrad and Gary travel to the top of the concession and prospect their way back down the valley. They construct makeshift sieves from old mesh and hike down the upper reaches of the river, prospecting as they go. Don and Warren are left to continue with the work of salvaging the bridge. Kirsten resupplies the prospecting team on horseback. After a dangerous two day hike down the valley, the prospectors reach the mining site, but with no diamonds. Don continues to sort the bags and one afternoon he finds 3 large carat diamonds in a bag. The team gathers round the microscope while Peter conducts the tests to determine carat, colour, purity and value. This is the culmination of years of work and all the time searching in the valley over the last few weeks. The team have to pull out of the valley for the remainder of the rainy season. They are unable to continue mining due to the constant rains and have to regroup and plan the 2nd phase of the operation.

programme.title: New Frontier
programme.desc: Beyond the asteroid belt lay the ice giants, some can be seen with the naked eye, others only glimpsed once by a passing probe. We are again sending cameras to the edge of the solar system giving us new insights into the evolution of our worlds.

programme.title: Nomads
programme.desc: Follow breathtaking travel adventures of some well known athletes of extreme sports. Have a look at some stunning locations in Alaska, Mexico, Argentina, Japan, Tahiti, Africa, Costa Rica, Norway, Hawaii and whitewater kayaking, extreme big mountain skiing, windsurfing, kiteboarding, extreme snowboarding and big wave surfing that push the limits of possibility. The focus is on compelling personalities and great storytelling.

programme.title: Brazils Coastlines
programme.desc: A series to celebrate Brazil and its diversity. We will explore the beauty and richness of the 8000 kilometer-long coasts, focusing on their natural and geographical aspects but also on its economic and cultural facets. An exciting journey blending the best aerial shots with stunning photography across the country to reveal both a cultural and human portrait.

programme.title: Water: H2O Stories
programme.desc: Water: H2O Stories is a 3x52 series revisiting the story of water on planet Earth and its disrupted course over time which has led to the 21st century biggest challenge.

programme.title: Inside Outer Space
programme.desc: Come with us as we explore and unravel the mysteries of what lies beyond our planet Earth. This is a series packed with space stories and information about our universe covering what we can see, how we can live in space and what science tells us about the past and the future as we journey inside out of space.

programme.title: Inside Outer Space
programme.desc: Come with us as we explore and unravel the mysteries of what lies beyond our planet Earth. This is a series packed with space stories and information about our universe covering what we can see, how we can live in space and what science tells us about the past and the future as we journey inside out of space.

programme.title: Inside Outer Space
programme.desc: Come with us as we explore and unravel the mysteries of what lies beyond our planet Earth. This is a series packed with space stories and information about our universe covering what we can see, how we can live in space and what science tells us about the past and the future as we journey inside out of space.

programme.title: Zenith - Advances In Space Exploration
programme.desc: Zenith - Advances in Space Exploration reveals these latest developments and the implications they hold for all of us.

programme.title: New Frontier
programme.desc: The ESA - JAXA joint Bepi-Colombo Mission is moments away from launch. The target is Mercury which has been too long neglected; this mission will shed new light on this strange world of light and dark.

programme.title: New Frontier
programme.desc: The Japanese Asteroid sample return mission has reached its target and is surveying the space rock ready to dip down and take a sample. The return of asteroid material to Earth will aid scientists in the evolving asteroid planetary defense systems.

programme.title: Depleted Uranium, A Very Presentable Killer
programme.desc: More than 50 countries now possess weapons based on depleted uranium (DU). Experimentation has been rife, and the consequences for civilians and the military alike have been dramatic. This investigation compares and contrasts the arguments of those who defend and attack a technology that is highly toxic. For 20 years, scientists, doctors, veterans and activists have denounced the use of DU. Against them are the arms industry lobbyists and nuclear authorities who continue to minimise the risks. Through archive documents, interviews and in situ investigations, accompanied by key witnesses (victims, experts...) we aim to present a clearer picture of the issues and stakes linked to the use of DU. Quick-paced, with a sense of urgency, the film underlines the essential background and conflicting viewpoints, enabling viewers to make up their own minds about a subject that concerns us all.

programme.title: WWII Documentary Films
programme.desc: Award-winning documentary films produced to enlighten future generations about the personal stories of the WWII generations.

programme.title: The Boy From the Wild
programme.desc: Growing up on a Game Reserve meant to help wildlife get out of captivity, it shares how it began and how Peter Meyer survived some incredible moments in the wild.

programme.title: What In the World
programme.desc: Presented by Peadar King, this series illustrates the human consequences of global economic inequalities and human rights violations, by focusing on how people encounter these issues on a daily basis. At the heart of Africa, the Congo for many people will always be associated with Joseph Conrads early twentieth-century novel the Heart of Darkness, a title that has become a by-word for the country. And for Benjamin and David, two former child soldiers, and Funaha held as a sex slave by one of the many militias that continue to terrorise the country, that metaphor remains a daily reality. The film explores how this seemingly never-ending conflict impacts on the people of North Kivu.

programme.title: Music Voyager
programme.desc: Music Voyager is a music and travel broadcast series (television/cable, broadband, in-flight and mobile) that invites viewers to discover the exciting sounds of the planet. The host is Jacob Edgar, an explorer who does not search for lost cities or ancient ruins. Hes on the quest for a different kind of treasure…music. As an ethnomusicologist and world music record producer, Edgar travels the globe hunting for the best songs the world has to offer, and he suffers through some of the worst…so you dont have to. Along the way, hes rewarded with a backstage pass to concert halls, street festivals, recording studios and rehearsal rooms. With local musicians as his guide, Edgar tastes exotic and occasionally ghastly food, visits off-the-beaten path attractions and parties the night away to amazing concerts at hidden venues that only the locals know. Join music voyager for unexpected adventures and surprising discoveries that unveil the magic, mystery and music of far off lands.

programme.title: Music Voyager
programme.desc: Music Voyager is a music and travel broadcast series (television/cable, broadband, in-flight and mobile) that invites viewers to discover the exciting sounds of the planet. The host is Jacob Edgar, an explorer who does not search for lost cities or ancient ruins. Hes on the quest for a different kind of treasure…music. As an ethnomusicologist and world music record producer, Edgar travels the globe hunting for the best songs the world has to offer, and he suffers through some of the worst…so you dont have to. Along the way, hes rewarded with a backstage pass to concert halls, street festivals, recording studios and rehearsal rooms. With local musicians as his guide, Edgar tastes exotic and occasionally ghastly food, visits off-the-beaten path attractions and parties the night away to amazing concerts at hidden venues that only the locals know. Join music voyager for unexpected adventures and surprising discoveries that unveil the magic, mystery and music of far off lands.

programme.title: Close Quarter Battle
programme.desc: "Special Operations" are special divisions of military, police or intelligence services that are highly qualified in specific areas of urban warfare and in a variety of special weapons and technology. Over the past forty years, all of the worlds superpowers have built up these groups in order to better fight wars, to counter terrorism and to conduct high-stakes police actions. This episode examines the history of such organizations, from the Green Berets, WWII paratroopers and naval special warfare units through to the Seal Team 6, the British SAS, and private contractors, including Black Water and Brown and Root. Showing how these operators are trained, how they plan, and what weaponry and tactical gear they use, the introductory episode of CQB provides viewers with a fast-paced overview of the techniques, strategies and equipment that have been successfully used by Military Special Operations.

programme.title: Slepkavas motīvs
programme.desc: Jūras spēku virsnieku, kurš kāpa pa karjeras kāpnēm un reiz iztaujāja teroristus Gvantanamo līcī, tiek atrasts miris viesnīcas numuriņā Floridā. Vai nežēlīgais noziegums ir saistīts ar viņa militāro dienestu, vai pie vainas ir noslēpumi, kas ir tuvāk mājām?

programme.title: Slepkavība, noslēpumi un mana ģimene
programme.desc: Advokāti izskata bēdīgi slaveno Dorsetas mājsaimnieces lietu, kas apsūdzēta sava jaunā vīra slepkavībā. Viņu lielākais izaicinājums ir nošķirt faktus no daiļliteratūras, jo stāsts iedvesmojis Tomasa Hārdija romānu "Tess of the DUrbervilles".

programme.title: Duo Mix
programme.desc: Nakts programma ar mūzikas video dažādām gaumēm. Dejojiet, dziediet līdzi vai izbaudiet, guļot zem segas.

programme.title: Pirmās 48 stundas
programme.desc: Izmeklētājiem, lai atrastu pazudušu jaunekli, ir jāatklāj ģimenes klusēšanas kodekss.

programme.title: Pirmās 48 stundas
programme.desc: Atlantā svešinieks autostāvvietā nošauj jaunu tēvu. Džordžijas štata Gvinetas apgabalā vīrietis tiek sadurts vairāk nekā 20 reizes - kāds, kam viņš uzticējies, vērsās pret viņu.

programme.title: Pirmās 48 stundas
programme.desc: Alabamas štata Mobilē 19 gadus veca jaunieša slepkavība kļūst personiska - komanda uzzina, ka upuris ir izmeklētāja Džermeina Rodžersa brālēns. Talsā 31 gadu vecu māti savas mājas priekšā nošauj negaidīts aizdomās turamais.

programme.title: Slepkavojošie radi
programme.desc: Divi brāļi tuksnesī īsteno sarežģītu shēmu, enšoties no bruņota furgona nozagt 300 tūkstošus dolāru. Kad izmeklētāji mēģina izsekot laupītājus, lieta kļūst par slepkavību - tiek atrasti abu furgonu vadījušo apsargu līķi.

programme.title: Slepkavojošie radi
programme.desc: 1992. gada rudenī divi brāļi terorizē Kaliforniju, uzsākot divus mēnešus ilgu noziegumu, kas ietver trīs brutālas slepkavības un daudzus citus nāvējošus uzbrukumus. Izmeklētāji strādā, cenšoties šos slepkavojošos radiniekus apturēt, pirms viņi atkal uzbrūk.

programme.title: Slepkavas motīvs
programme.desc: Armijnieks tiek nošauts kādā Kalifornijas tuksneša mazpilsētā. Izmeklēšana pārbauda draudzības saiknes un ģimenes lojalitāti, cenšoties atrast slepkavu.

programme.title: Slepkavas motīvs
programme.desc: Radio personība un veterānu aizstāve tiek nošauta pašas guļamistabā. Vai viņas skaļā viedokļa paušana bija iemesls šim noziegumam vai tomēr viņas ģimene slēpj pēdas līdz slepkavai?

programme.title: Slepkavas motīvs
programme.desc: Populāra terapeite vienā dienā ir pilnīgi vesela, bet jau nākamajā nomirst sāpīgā nāvē. Kad ārsti atklāj viņas nāves iemeslu, kas nav dabīgs, policijai jāsāk meklēt, kurš un kāpēc vēlējās šīs sievietes nāvi.

programme.title: Slepkavība, noslēpumi un mana ģimene
programme.desc: Divi slīpēti noziedznieku advokāti atkārtoti izmeklē Alfrēda Mūra tiesas prāvu, notiesāšanu un nāvessodu par divu policistu nošaušanu policijas kordonā, kas ieskāva viņa lauku māju 1951. gadā.

programme.title: Slepkavība, noslēpumi un mana ģimene
programme.desc: Advokāti Saša un Džeremijs atkārtoti izskata 1900. gada piejūras slepkavības lietu un uziet notiesātā vīrieša radinieku, kurš tagad meklē noslēpumainā svaiņa pēdās.

programme.title: Sekss un slepkavības
programme.desc: Jaunprecētā Lorēna Felpsa, cīnoties par savu dzīvību, tiek sadurta 123 reizes. Slepkava savā rīcībā vaino murgus un saaukstēšanās zāles.

programme.title: Sekss un slepkavības
programme.desc: Pazūd māte. Satriecoši novērošanas kameru video atklāj stāstu par viņas pēdējām stundām.

programme.title: Sekss un slepkavības
programme.desc: Romantisks un ainavisks agra rīta brauciens ar laivu pārvēršas nāvējošā situācijā - Lerijs Izenbergs pārkrīt pāri bortam. Izmeklētāji atklāj pusmiljona dolāru pazušanu, kas varētu būt slepkavības motīvs.

programme.title: Algota slepkavība
programme.desc: Pēc tam, kad vētraina romantika beidzas ar uzbrukumu, ārsts cenšas apklusināt savu bijušo. Satraucoša satikšanās aizsāk slepenu operāciju, un policija atklāj dziļāku sazvērestību ar vairākiem mērķiem.

programme.title: Algota slepkavība
programme.desc: Vai rakstnieces apsēstība ar noziegumiem varētu palīdzēt viņas tumšākajai fantāzijai? Pašpasludinātās romānistes sižets par vīra pāragru nāvi iegūst negaidītu pavērsienu, un operācija atklāj sagrozītu patiesību.

programme.title: Pirmās 48 stundas
programme.desc: Izmeklētājiem, lai atrastu pazudušu jaunekli, ir jāatklāj ģimenes klusēšanas kodekss.

programme.title: Duo Mix
programme.desc: Nakts programma ar mūzikas video dažādām gaumēm. Dejojiet, dziediet līdzi vai izbaudiet, guļot zem segas.

programme.title: Pirmās 48 stundas
programme.desc: Mobilā ielu kautiņš pāraug apšaudē, kuras rezultātā vīrietis nomirst savā mājas pagalmā. Talsā notiek apšaude no garāmbraucošas automašīnas, kas aizsākusies bandu ķildas dēļ. Tā prasa 16 gadus vecas meitenes dzīvību, bet viņas draugs izmisīgi mēģina izdzīvot.

programme.title: Pirmās 48 stundas
programme.desc: Tiek nošauts nevainīgs garāmgājējs, kurš aizsargājis jaunu sievieti. Izmeklētāji steidzas noskaidrot, kurš raidīja nāvējošos šāvienus, pirms tiek ievainots kāds cits.

programme.title: Slepkavojošie radi
programme.desc: Klusās Misūri štata Noelas iedzīvotāji ir šokēti - vietējā banka tiek aplaupīta nekaunīgā nakts laupīšanā. Izmeklēšanā notiek pavērsiena punkts, kad bankas prezidents tiek atrasts miris un brāļu pāris pēkšņi nonāk pie lielas naudas.

programme.title: Slepkavojošie radi
programme.desc: Notikumi kļūst neskaidri Tenesī upes piekrastē - mīdiju izplatītāju un viņa līgavu nogalina brāļu trijotne, kas ir apņēmības pilna nozagt lielu naudu un apklusināt ikvienu, kas viņiem traucē.

programme.title: Slepkavojošie radi
programme.desc: Ambiciozie Lunu brāļi izvēlējušies mežonīgi atšķirīgus ceļus - viens kļūst par godalgotu armijas virsnieku, bet otrs iekļūst meksikāņu kartelī. Kad brāļu pasaules saduras, slepkavība galu galā viņus visus sagrauj.

programme.title: Slepkavas motīvs
programme.desc: Kad Luiziānā tiek atrasts apdrošināšanas brokera Braiena Deivisa līķis, policija atklāj, ka viņš bija cilvēks ar noslēpumainu dzīvi. Vai viņa tuvākie varētu slēpt līdz šim lielāko mirušā noslēpumu?

programme.title: Slepkavas motīvs
programme.desc: Jūras spēku virsnieku, kurš kāpa pa karjeras kāpnēm un reiz iztaujāja teroristus Gvantanamo līcī, tiek atrasts miris viesnīcas numuriņā Floridā. Vai nežēlīgais noziegums ir saistīts ar viņa militāro dienestu, vai pie vainas ir noslēpumi, kas ir tuvāk mājām?

programme.title: Slepkavība, noslēpumi un mana ģimene
programme.desc: Džeremijs un Saša izmeklē lauku lietu par slepkavību Korkā, Īrijā 1894. gadā. Džons Tviss tika pakārts par Džeimsa Donovana slepkavību, taču viņš protestēja par savu nevainību līdz pat pašām beigām.

programme.title: Slepkavība, noslēpumi un mana ģimene
programme.desc: Advokāti izmeklē savu līdz šim vecāko lietu — sievietes pasažieres noslīkšanu laivā Stafordšīrā 1839. gadā, par ko laivinieki tika notiesāti un publiski pakārti.

programme.title: Slepkavība, noslēpumi un mana ģimene
programme.desc: Advokāti izskata bēdīgi slaveno Dorsetas mājsaimnieces lietu, kas apsūdzēta sava jaunā vīra slepkavībā. Viņu lielākais izaicinājums ir nošķirt faktus no daiļliteratūras, jo stāsts iedvesmojis Tomasa Hārdija romānu "Tess of the DUrbervilles".

programme.title: Sekss un slepkavības
programme.desc: 2018. gada 22. martā Springbrukā 24 gadus vecais Alekss Vudvorts Ezras Makkendlesa automašīnā tika 16 reizes brutāli sadurts galvā, kaklā, cirksnī un rumpī. Makkendlesam 2020. gadā par slepkavību tika piespriests mūža ieslodzījums.

programme.title: Sekss un slepkavības
programme.desc: Ikdienas pirkums varētu novest policiju pie Lauras Akersones - jaunas mātes, kuras ķermeņa daļas uzpeldēja aligatoru pilnā strautā teju 2000 kilometru attālumā no vietas, kur viņa pēdējo reizi redzēta - slepkavas.

programme.title: Algota slepkavība
programme.desc: Ģimenes drāma kļūst nāvējoša - atstumta vīramāte lūdz senu draudzeni, kurai savulaik bijusi saikne ar mafiju, nogalināt viņas vedeklu.

programme.title: Algota slepkavība
programme.desc: Zināms acu ķirurgs lūdz savam IT speciālsitam atrast krievu slepkavu, kas nogalinātu bijušo darbinieku. Notikumiem sākoties, viņš maina mērķi.

programme.title: Algota slepkavība
programme.desc: Nežēlīgs noziedznieks no krāpšanas pāriet uz slepkavību nozari, plānojot nežēlīgu atriebību tiesu sistēmai. Šis sižets aizskar detektīvus, kuri cenšas novērst sava drauga un kolēģa slepkavību.

programme.title: Precējies... Ir bērni
programme.desc: Pegija dodas dejot ar Mārsiju un aizraujas ar skaistu vīrieti Endiju. Tikmēr mājās Als sastapies ar Endija sievu Pītu.

programme.title: Precējies... Ir bērni
programme.desc: Tagad jau kā topošā modele, Kellija savai pirmajai provei jaunās Allente automašīnas pārstāves amatā izgudro manevru "The Bundy Bounce". Bada lielā mute padod ideju citai modelei, tāpēc Kellijai ir jāņem lietas savās rokās un jātiek galā ar konkurenci. Tikmēr Pegija sāk streiku par mājas darbiem, un ​​Als uzskata, ka viņa ir bezjēdzīga.

programme.title: Divarpus vīri
programme.desc: Seriāls ir par diviem brāļiem — Čārliju un Alanu —, kas kopīgiem spēkiem audzina Alana dēlu Džeiku. Alans ir šķīries no sievas un pārcēlies dzīvot pie Čārlija, kas rada daudz komisku situāciju.

programme.title: Divarpus vīri
programme.desc: Seriāls ir par diviem brāļiem — Čārliju un Alanu —, kas kopīgiem spēkiem audzina Alana dēlu Džeiku. Alans ir šķīries no sievas un pārcēlies dzīvot pie Čārlija, kas rada daudz komisku situāciju.

programme.title: Bruklina
programme.desc: Komēdijseriāls seko detektīva Džeika Peralta un viņa daudzveidīgo un jauko kolēģu piedzīvojumiem Ņujorkas policijas 99. iecirknī.

programme.title: Bruklina
programme.desc: Komēdijseriāls seko detektīva Džeika Peralta un viņa daudzveidīgo un jauko kolēģu piedzīvojumiem Ņujorkas policijas 99. iecirknī.

programme.title: Bioloģijas kurss
programme.desc: Džeks ir vīlies popkorna gatavošanas ierīcē, ko pasūtījis, tādēļ viņš un studenti plāno atriebties; Helēna atgriežas skolā, lai iegūtu vidusskolas grādu, bet viņas prombūtnes laikā direktora Durbina birojā iestājas haoss.

programme.title: Bioloģijas kurss
programme.desc: Pjū kungs plāno ekskursiju uz Ohaio dabaszinātņu Toledo nodaļu. Džeks nevar uzrakstīt pats savu grāmatu, tādēļ viņš piekrīt būt populārā autora Robina Švanka rakstnieks, lai tikai ievietotu Švanka grāmatā savas nodaļas.

programme.title: Bioloģijas kurss
programme.desc: Džeka karš ar kaimiņu sasniedz pagrieziena punktu, kas draud sabojāt randiņu ar Lineti. Skolas fotogrāfs paaugstina savu likmi, Durbins pārņem skolas bildes savās rokās.

programme.title: Bioloģijas kurss
programme.desc: Džeks ir sašutis - viņa vecais vidusskolas kauslis tiek pieņemts darbā par motivējošu runātāju Vitlokā. Mērija, Stefa un Mišela izvirzīja savus personīgos mērķus sieviešu pilnvaru jomā, netīši izraisot plaisu starp Helēnu un Durbinu.

programme.title: Bioloģijas kurss
programme.desc: Kad budžeta samazinājumi draud izķidāt Vitloku un apdraudēt darbu, Džeks savervē Mēriju, Stefu un Mišelu, lai atbrīvotos no uzrauga. Durbins plāno aicinājumu sirdij, bet studenti - dvēselei.

programme.title: Bioloģijas kurss
programme.desc: Pēc tam, kad izplatās apkaunojošs video, kurā redzams, kā viņš nokrīt no skatuves, Džeks plāno izveidot savu populāro video. Durbins, Helēna un skolotāji izseko Vitloka bēdīgi slavenāko piemēslotāju: Cukurtēvu.

programme.title: Bioloģijas kurss
programme.desc: Kad Džeks tiek padzīts no Hārvardas plāna, viņam tiek piedāvāta iespēja pāriet pie Mērijas ar vienu nosacījumu — viņam jāpalīdz viņai šķirties no viņas gudrā drauga. Entonijs kļūst par Durbina labo roku.

programme.title: Amerikāņu ģimenīte
programme.desc: Kema māsa ierodas pilsētā ar labām ziņām. Fils un Klēra piekrīt izlaist Lūka futbola spēli. Glorija atsakās atzīt, ka viņai vajag brilles. Aleksa domā, ka Džejs krāpjas Words With Friends.

programme.title: Amerikāņu ģimenīte
programme.desc: Džejs izdarīja daudz, lai rezervētu vakariņu laiku viskarstākajā jaunajā restorānā. Diemžēl katrā mājsaimniecībā ir kāds, kas kavē.

programme.title: Amerikāņu ģimenīte
programme.desc: Fils cenšas atgriezt tēti randiņu pasaulē. Džejam nepatīk Glorijas jaunā aukles izvēle. Mičels un Kamerons nav pārsteigti par sava vecā drauga Pepera plāniem.

programme.title: Amerikāņu ģimenīte
programme.desc: Gadatirgū Fils mēģina pārsteigt Klēru ar dāvanu. Džejs strādā par "policistu". Menijs piedalās kūku cepšanas konkursā. Lūks satiek simpātiju, bet Kamerons mēģina saliedēt futbola komandu.

programme.title: Amerikāņu ģimenīte
programme.desc: Klēra pievienojas Džejam kongresā. Kems, Mičels un Lilija apmeklē Kema bērnības fermu Misūrī. Fils salauž Džeja dārgo Apollo 13 modeli. Heilija un Aleksa cīnās par picu piegādātāja simpātijām.

programme.title: Bruklina
programme.desc: Komēdijseriāls seko detektīva Džeika Peralta un viņa daudzveidīgo un jauko kolēģu piedzīvojumiem Ņujorkas policijas 99. iecirknī.

programme.title: Visi mīl Reimondu
programme.desc: Debra izmēģina jaunu pieeju Marijas negatīvajai attieksmei.

programme.title: Visi mīl Reimondu
programme.desc: Rejs un Debra nolemj, ka dvīņi vēl vienu gadu paliek pirmsskolā.

programme.title: Visi mīl Reimondu
programme.desc: Rejs nolemj nofotografēties ģimenes bildē Marijas Ziemassvētku dāvanai. Taču viņa nevēlējās, lai tajā būtu Debras ģimene.

programme.title: Visi mīl Reimondu
programme.desc: Marija sāk domāt, ka Roberts ir gejs - viņš atkal izšķīries ar Eimiju.

programme.title: Visi mīl Reimondu
programme.desc: Kad Rejs un Debra uzzina, ka pret Aliju nostājies kauslis, Rejs nolemj veikt izmeklēšanu.

programme.title: Ofiss
programme.desc: Endijs mēģina birojā vadīt mazo uzņēmumu semināru. Maikls piekrīt palīdzēt, uzdodoties par grieķu uzņēmēju, un cenšas panākt, lai Hollija viņam piespēlētu.

programme.title: Ofiss
programme.desc: Džims saņem ārkārtas zvanu no Helēnas, tādēļ viņš ir spiests atstāt Maiklu degvielas uzpildes stacijas tualetē. Tikmēr Hollija, Erina un Dvaits dodas Maikla meklējumos. Pemas mākslas darbs aizāk tā paraksta konkursu.

programme.title: Ofiss
programme.desc: Džims saņem ārkārtas zvanu no Helēnas, tādēļ viņš ir spiests atstāt Maiklu degvielas uzpildes stacijas tualetē. Tikmēr Hollija, Erina un Dvaits dodas Maikla meklējumos. Pemas mākslas darbs aizāk tā paraksta konkursu.

programme.title: Ofiss
programme.desc: Ir Valentīna diena, un birojam ir apnicis Maikla un Hollijas izdarības. Endijs palīdz Erinai atrisināt Geiba mīklas, lai atrastu dāvanu, bet Džims un Pema piedzeras un cenšas atrast vietu birojā, kur nodarboties ar seksu.

programme.title: Ofiss
programme.desc: Ir Valentīna diena, un birojam ir apnicis Maikla un Hollijas izdarības. Endijs palīdz Erinai atrisināt Geiba mīklas, lai atrastu dāvanu, bet Džims un Pema piedzeras un cenšas atrast vietu birojā, kur nodarboties ar seksu.

programme.title: Draugi
programme.desc: Seriāla galvenie varoņi ir seši draugi - Reičela, Monika, Fēbe, Džoijs, Čendlers un Ross, kuri dzīvo kaimiņos un regulāri nonāk aizraujošās un ļoti komiskās situācijās.

programme.title: Precējies... Ir bērni
programme.desc: Pegija uzzina, ka viņa nekad nav ieguvusi vidusskolas diplomu, jo viņai pēdējā kursa laikā neizdevās mājturības ekonomika. Izmantojot savu "dzīves pieredzi" kā kursa kredītpunktu, viņa kopā ar Kellijas klasi kārto gala eksāmenu, lai iegūtu diplomu.

programme.title: Precējies... Ir bērni
programme.desc: Kellija nevis dodas uz skolu, bet gan iegūst darbu kā televīzijas laikapstākļu meitene. Tas iepriecina Bandijus, jo viņa nopelnīs vairāk naudas nekā Als.

programme.title: Precējies... Ir bērni
programme.desc: Pēc murgiem par kājām skaista sieviete lūdz Alu tiesāt konkursā "Garys Shoes", ar kura dalībniekiem viņa "nekad nevarēja sacensties". Tikmēr Kellija piemāna Mārsijau un Badu, ka viņi ir gulējuši kopā.

programme.title: Precējies... Ir bērni
programme.desc: Pegija garāžas izpārdošanā nopirks jebko, tāpēc, atvedot mājās kuiļa galvu, garāžā vairs nav vietas, kur to nolikt. Als nolemj, ka ar to pietiek, un viņš nolemj izpārdot savu garāžu, neskatoties uz Pegijas protestiem.

programme.title: Precējies... Ir bērni
programme.desc: Bandiji nolēmuši Darba svētkos doties izbraucienā. Lielāko svētku daļu viņi pavada, sēžot sastrēgumos, strīdoties savā starpā un cīnoties ar apkārt esošajiem autovadītājiem.

programme.title: Bioloģijas kurss
programme.desc: Pēc datora salūšanas Džeks pulcē savu klasi, lai uzvarētu ikgadējā konkursā "Whitlocks Got Talent", cerot naudas balvu novirzīt jaunam klēpjdatoram. Helēna un Durbins vada šovu. Mērija, Stefa un Mišela sagatavo procedūras.

programme.title: Bioloģijas kurss
programme.desc: Džeks ir vīlies popkorna gatavošanas ierīcē, ko pasūtījis, tādēļ viņš un studenti plāno atriebties; Helēna atgriežas skolā, lai iegūtu vidusskolas grādu, bet viņas prombūtnes laikā direktora Durbina birojā iestājas haoss.

programme.title: Bioloģijas kurss
programme.desc: Koledžu izstāde ierodas Vitlokā, un Sarikai ir piedāvājums Džekam: tikt Hārvardā, un viņa iegūs viņa grāmatu savas izdevējas rokās; Stefa gatavojas svinībām; Helēna piesakās koledžā.

programme.title: Bioloģijas kurss
programme.desc: Džeks ir vīlies popkorna gatavošanas ierīcē, ko pasūtījis, tādēļ viņš un studenti plāno atriebties; Helēna atgriežas skolā, lai iegūtu vidusskolas grādu, bet viņas prombūtnes laikā direktora Durbina birojā iestājas haoss.

programme.title: Bioloģijas kurss
programme.desc: Pjū kungs plāno ekskursiju uz Ohaio dabaszinātņu Toledo nodaļu. Džeks nevar uzrakstīt pats savu grāmatu, tādēļ viņš piekrīt būt populārā autora Robina Švanka rakstnieks, lai tikai ievietotu Švanka grāmatā savas nodaļas.

programme.title: Amerikāņu ģimenīte
programme.desc: Kems mēģina labot skolas rekordu kā jauniņais futbola treneris. Fils ir uz robežas mēneša laikā nepārdot nevienu māju. Klēra joprojām cīnās ar to, ka ir priekšnieka meita. Mičels mēģina viegli pievilt savu priekšnieku.

programme.title: Amerikāņu ģimenīte
programme.desc: Lūks palīdz Filam mēģināt sasniegt Kanādu ar savu eliptisko trenažieri. Džejs un Menijs mēģina savvaļā tikt pie Ziemassvētku eglītes. Glorija ir greizsirdīga uz Klēru un viņas mammu. Ziemassvētkos kāds misēklis liek Kemam un Lilijai nonākt pie bezpajumtniekiem.

programme.title: Amerikāņu ģimenīte
programme.desc: Fils apmuļķo Lūku apmeklēt deju nodarbību, taču tas pavēršas pret viņu, un baltie meli viņu noved aiz restēm. Džejs un Glorija rīko Menija un Džo dzimšanas dienas ballīti, bet abi ir noraizējušies, ka Menijs varētu saieties ar meitenēm, kas ir no citas klases.

programme.title: Amerikāņu ģimenīte
programme.desc: Vecāki dodas uz atvērto durvju dienu skolā. Aleksa tiekas ar terapeitu. Menijs un Lūks sarīko dubultrandiņu ar dvīņiem, un Mičels pēc sarunas ar kaimiņu nejūtas pietiekami "zaļš".

programme.title: Amerikāņu ģimenīte
programme.desc: Fils un Klēra aizved Heiliju vakariņās, lai pārrunātu viņas nākotni. Šortijs pastāsta Džejam, ka viņš un viņa sieva pārceļas uz Kostariku. Mičels un Kems neapzināti pārtrauc pāra saderināšanās vakariņas.

programme.title: Bruklina
programme.desc: Komēdijseriāls seko detektīva Džeika Peralta un viņa daudzveidīgo un jauko kolēģu piedzīvojumiem Ņujorkas policijas 99. iecirknī.

programme.title: Visi mīl Reimondu
programme.desc: Frenks stāsta Alijai, ka Rejs dodas uz elli, jo viņš neiet uz baznīcu. Jūtoties vainīgs par to, ka Frenks ir labs reliģiskais paraugs, Rejs nolemj kļūt par parastu draudzes locekli.

programme.title: Visi mīl Reimondu
programme.desc: Robertam ir saķeršanās ar bulli, un viņam kādu laiku jāpaliek kopā ar Mariju un Frenku.

programme.title: Visi mīl Reimondu
programme.desc: Rejs nejauši pa virsu kāzu videoierakstam pārraksta futbola spēli, kā rezultātā Debra ir ļoti saniknota.

programme.title: Visi mīl Reimondu
programme.desc: Rejs mēģina iepazīt Alijas mīļāko kāršu spēli.

programme.title: Visi mīl Reimondu
programme.desc: Beidzot Debrai padevusies laba maltīte, bet Marija tā dēļ saniknojas.

programme.title: Ofiss
programme.desc: Maikls pārliecina Holliju dot Todam Pekeram darbu birojā, un visi darbinieki ir sašutuši. Endijs kļūst sarūgtināts - Pema saņem jaunu datoru, bet viņš ne.

programme.title: Ofiss
programme.desc: Maikls plāno bildināt Holliju Dunder Mifflin garāžas izpārdošanas dienā, taču Hollijai, iespējams, nāksies ņemt atvaļinājumu, lai dotos uz Kolorādo pie saslimušā tēva.

programme.title: Ofiss
programme.desc: Maikls vada savu pēdējo Dandiju balvu Skrentonas filiāles vadītājs, taču gaisā valda spriedze, un jaunajam bosam Diandželo Vikeram ir problēmas ar līdzvadītāja pienākumiem.

programme.title: Ofiss
programme.desc: Birojs gatavojas Maikla pēdējai dienai Dunder Mifflin, bet Maikls nevienam nestāsta, ka prom dosies dienu ātrāk. Tikmēr Diandželo pavada nervozo Endiju vizītē pie viena no vecajiem Maikla klientiem.

programme.title: Ofiss
programme.desc: Birojs gatavojas Maikla pēdējai dienai Dunder Mifflin, bet Maikls nevienam nestāsta, ka prom dosies dienu ātrāk. Tikmēr Diandželo pavada nervozo Endiju vizītē pie viena no vecajiem Maikla klientiem.

programme.title: Draugi
programme.desc: Seriāla galvenie varoņi ir seši draugi - Reičela, Monika, Fēbe, Džoijs, Čendlers un Ross, kuri dzīvo kaimiņos un regulāri nonāk aizraujošās un ļoti komiskās situācijās.

programme.title: Draugi
programme.desc: Seriāla galvenie varoņi ir seši draugi - Reičela, Monika, Fēbe, Džoijs, Čendlers un Ross, kuri dzīvo kaimiņos un regulāri nonāk aizraujošās un ļoti komiskās situācijās.

programme.title: Draugi

programme.title: Draugi
programme.desc: Seriāla galvenie varoņi ir seši draugi - Reičela, Monika, Fēbe, Džoijs, Čendlers un Ross, kuri dzīvo kaimiņos un regulāri nonāk aizraujošās un ļoti komiskās situācijās.

programme.title: Precējies... Ir bērni
programme.desc: Als un Kellija izliekas par slimiem, lai izvairītos no došanās uz Vankeras apgabalu kopā ar Pegu un Badu. Als ar nepacietību gaida savu kluso un mierīgo nedēļas nogali, bet tad kellija saslimst.

programme.title: Precējies... Ir bērni
programme.desc: Badam ir jauna autovadītāja apliecība. Kad viņš saskrienas ar Mercedes, Als redz iespēju tiesā tikt galā. Vismaz viņam ir cerība. Prasības zaudēšana sāpina, bet tas, ko viņš piedzīvo, lai atmaksātu izlīgumu, ir patiesi sāpīgi.

programme.title: Precējies... Ir bērni
programme.desc: Als tiek izslēgts no apkārtnes softbola komandas tieši pirms lielās spēles. Kad viņa zvaigžņotais aizstājējs tiek apturēts pēdējā kārtā, viņa komandai un ģimenei ir jālūdzas.

programme.title: Precējies... Ir bērni
programme.desc: Pegija dodas dejot ar Mārsiju un aizraujas ar skaistu vīrieti Endiju. Tikmēr mājās Als sastapies ar Endija sievu Pītu.

programme.title: Precējies... Ir bērni
programme.desc: Tagad jau kā topošā modele, Kellija savai pirmajai provei jaunās Allente automašīnas pārstāves amatā izgudro manevru "The Bundy Bounce". Bada lielā mute padod ideju citai modelei, tāpēc Kellijai ir jāņem lietas savās rokās un jātiek galā ar konkurenci. Tikmēr Pegija sāk streiku par mājas darbiem, un ​​Als uzskata, ka viņa ir bezjēdzīga.

programme.title: Forsaiti
programme.desc: Stāsts par Viktorijas laikmeta beigu posma ģimenes dzīvi, mīlestību, pārbaudījumiem un triumfu, kad ģimenes locekļiem jāizvēlas starp tradīcijām, ziedošanos, personīgo laimi un mīlestību.

programme.title: Endavers
programme.desc: Slepkavība koledžas dārzā liek Endaveram izmeklēt slavena orķestra darbību. Tomēr, kad notiek otra traģēdija, viņš atklāj kādu notikumu, par ko citi labāk aizmirstu.

programme.title: Mārlova slepkavību klubs
programme.desc: Kad Džūdita Pota kļūst par slepkavības aculiecinieci un vietējā policija netic viņas stāstam, viņa nolemj veikt izmeklēšanu pati.

programme.title: Agatas Kristi Mārpla
programme.desc: Mis Mārpla atrodas uz tropiskās Sv. Honora salas. Kad kāds viesnīcas viesis majors Palgarve mirst drīz pēc ierašanās, Mārplu nepārliecina oficiālā versija par sirdslēkmi.

programme.title: Forsaiti
programme.desc: Stāsts par Viktorijas laikmeta beigu posma ģimenes dzīvi, mīlestību, pārbaudījumiem un triumfu, kad ģimenes locekļiem jāizvēlas starp tradīcijām, ziedošanos, personīgo laimi un mīlestību.

programme.title: Skārletas jaunkundze un Velingtons
programme.desc: Elīza dodas uz cietumu Londonas nomalē. Viņa un Hercogs pārmeklē šķietami tukšu ēku, tomēr izrādās, ka tur slēpjas banda.

programme.title: Lielas un mazas radības
programme.desc: Ir Ziemassvētku vakars un diena pirms Helēnas un Hjū kāzām. Džeimss saņem zvanu no Bērta Čepmena, kuram nepieciešama palīdzība ar suņa dzemdībām.

programme.title: Lielas un mazas radības
programme.desc: Džeimss saņem zvanu no Pamfrijas kundzes, kura baidās, ka viņas mīlulis mirst. Skeldeilā Tristans gatavojas atgriezties Edinburgas Universitātē, bet Zigfrīdam ir citi plāni.

programme.title: Lielas un mazas radības
programme.desc: Pienācis laiks Daroubijas šovam, un Džeimss ir iecelts par galveno veterinārārstu, bet Zigfrīds un Tristans domā, ka Džeimss neizturēs dienu bez padošanās.

programme.title: Lielas un mazas radības
programme.desc: Ielejā ir iestājusies skarba ziema. Zigfrīdam ir gripa, un Džeimsam jāstrādā dubultā. Kad Holas kundze atklāj, ka ir Džeimsa dzimšanas diena, Tristans sāk plānot pārsteiguma ballīti.

programme.title: Lielas un mazas radības
programme.desc: Ir Ziemassvētku vakars un diena pirms Helēnas un Hjū kāzām. Džeimss saņem zvanu no Bērta Čepmena, kuram nepieciešama palīdzība ar suņa dzemdībām.

programme.title: Dalgliešs
programme.desc: Adams Dalgliešs tiek aizsūtīts uz medmāsu skolu, lai izmeklētu kādas demonstrācijas laikā noindētas studentes nāvi. Pēc citas studentes nāves Dalglieša slepkavas medības kļūst intensīvākas.

programme.title: Dalgliešs
programme.desc: Kāds draugs Dalgliešu uzaicina uz Dorsetu, kur viņš noskaidro, ka draugs un kāds netālu esošā pansionāta iedzīvotājs nesen tika noslepkavoti. Dalgliešs ir pārliecināts, ka nāves ir saistītas.

programme.title: Forsaiti
programme.desc: Stāsts par Viktorijas laikmeta beigu posma ģimenes dzīvi, mīlestību, pārbaudījumiem un triumfu, kad ģimenes locekļiem jāizvēlas starp tradīcijām, ziedošanos, personīgo laimi un mīlestību.

programme.title: Lielas un mazas radības
programme.desc: 1946. g. maijā cilvēki pulcējās pie radio, lai klausītos ziņas par kara beigām. Holas kundze iegādājas biļeti uz Sanderlendu, un Zigfrīds mēģina viņu pārtvert, ierodoties tieši pirms iekāpšanas.

programme.title: Slepkavība mazpilsētā
programme.desc: Karls Albergs pārceļas uz klusu piekrastes pilsētiņu, jo ir noguris no policijas darba lielpilsētā. Tomēr viņam nākas izmantot visas prasmes, lai izmeklētu slepkavības, kas arvien turpina notikt.

programme.title: Džeina Eira
programme.desc: Džeina atgriežas Tornfīldā pēc Misis Rīdas nāves, un Ročesters beidzot viņu bildina. Vai viņa piekritīs?

programme.title: Džeina Eira
programme.desc: Džeina, kuras sirds ir salauzta, pamet Tornfīldu. Pārgurusi, bez naudas un cerības, viņa saļimst tīrelī, kur viņu izglābj sers Džons Riverss un viņa māsas. Viņi atgriež Džeinu dzīvē.

programme.title: Agatas Kristi Mārpla
programme.desc: Mis Mārpla atrodas uz tropiskās Sv. Honora salas. Kad kāds viesnīcas viesis majors Palgarve mirst drīz pēc ierašanās, Mārplu nepārliecina oficiālā versija par sirdslēkmi.

programme.title: Agatas Kristi Mārpla
programme.desc: Mis Mārpla atrod draudzenei darbu netālu esošajā Grīnšovas folijā. Kad vairāki biedri tiek atrasti miruši, aizdomās tiek turēti visi, un neviens nevar iedomāties, kādus noslēpumus atklās Džeina.

programme.title: Komisārs Rikardi
programme.desc: Noslēpumainais policijas inspektors Rikardi ir nolādēts, tomēr viņa lāsts ir visai noderīgs. Viņš var redzēt vardarbīgā nāvē mirušo spokus un dzirdēt viņu pēdējās domas.

programme.title: Mis Fišeres modernie izmeklēšanas noslēpumi
programme.desc: Džeims dodas mājās, lai izmeklētu bērnības drauga slepkavību. Peregrīna iejaucas izmeklēšanā, kas uzplēš senas Džeimsa brūces.

programme.title: Mis Fišeres modernie izmeklēšanas noslēpumi
programme.desc: Pirms prestižās Melburnas suņu izstādes pilsētā notiek aktīva darbība, tomēr kāds skandāls apdraud tā norisi, kad tiek atrasts kāds miris dalībnieks.

programme.title: Mis Fišeres modernie izmeklēšanas noslēpumi
programme.desc: Kad bandas locekļa galva uzrodas uz boulinga celiņa, Peregrīne un Džeimss attopas divu Melburnas visnežēlīgāko pusaudžu bandu kara krustugunīs.

programme.title: Mis Fišeres modernie izmeklēšanas noslēpumi
programme.desc: Kad baložu sacensību entuziasta ķermenis tiek atrasts nosmērēts ar darvu baložu mājā, Peregrīne un Džeimss dodas uz vienu no Melburnas piepilsētas baložu sacīkšu klubiem.

programme.title: Agatas Kristi Mārpla
programme.desc: Mis Mārpla atrodas uz tropiskās Sv. Honora salas. Kad kāds viesnīcas viesis majors Palgarve mirst drīz pēc ierašanās, Mārplu nepārliecina oficiālā versija par sirdslēkmi.

programme.title: Skārletas jaunkundze un Velingtons
programme.desc: Kad Elīzas tēvs mirst no sirdstriekas, viņa pārņem tēva detektīvbiznesu par spīti citu uzskatiem.

programme.title: Skārletas jaunkundze un Velingtons
programme.desc: Kā vienīgā Londonas sieviete-detektīve Elīza ar grūtībām atrod darbu. Viņai ļoti vajag naudu, tāpēc nākas uzņemties šķietami neatrisināmu lietu — jāpierāda vīra, kurš jau atzinies, nevainīgums.

programme.title: Skārletas jaunkundze un Velingtons
programme.desc: Skotlendjards novēro daudz bandu un politisko grupu. Elīzu noalgo Hercogs, lai viņa iefiltrētos vienā šādā grupā. Elīza ir priecīga, līdz uzzina, kas ir jāizspiego...

programme.title: Skārletas jaunkundze un Velingtons
programme.desc: Viktoriāņi bija apsēsti ar nāvi un spiritismu. Šajā sērijā Elīzu nolīgst mirušo fotogrāfs, kurš saņem savādas un draudpilnas vēstules no mirušo pasaules.

programme.title: Skārletas jaunkundze un Velingtons
programme.desc: Elīza dodas uz cietumu Londonas nomalē. Viņa un Hercogs pārmeklē šķietami tukšu ēku, tomēr izrādās, ka tur slēpjas banda.

programme.title: Mērdoka noslēpumi
programme.desc: Atrodoties Londonā, Mērdoks, Ogdena un Suzanna cieš bumbas sprādzienā, ko, visticamāk, izraisīja nu jau mirusi sufražete.

programme.title: Mērdoka noslēpumi
programme.desc: Mērdoks un Vats mēģinājumus aizsargāt dārgu rubīnu, kas paredzēts jaunam muzejam, apdraud apņēmīgi zagļi.

programme.title: Mērdoka noslēpumi
programme.desc: Mērdokam ir aizdomas, ka sievietes nāve ir saistīta ar korumpētu mēra kandidātu, kam, iespējams, iepriekš izdevies izvairīties no atbildības par slepkavību.

programme.title: Mērdoka noslēpumi
programme.desc: Mērdoka izmeklēšana par noslēpumainu slepkavību var būt saistīta ar jaunu ēstuvi, kurā Higinss un Roberts ieguldījuši līdzekļus.

programme.title: Slepkavība mazpilsētā
programme.desc: Karls Albergs pārceļas uz klusu piekrastes pilsētiņu, jo ir noguris no policijas darba lielpilsētā. Tomēr viņam nākas izmantot visas prasmes, lai izmeklētu slepkavības, kas arvien turpina notikt.

programme.title: Mārlova slepkavību klubs
programme.desc: Kad Džūdita Pota kļūst par slepkavības aculiecinieci un vietējā policija netic viņas stāstam, viņa nolemj veikt izmeklēšanu pati.

programme.title: Mārlova slepkavību klubs
programme.desc: Pēc vikāra sievas Bekas un suņu staidzinātājas Sjūzijas iesaistīšanās izmeklēšanā trijotne atklāj nozīmīgus pierādījumus, kas ļauj izdarīt kādu šokējošu atklājumu.

programme.title: Forsaiti
programme.desc: Stāsts par Viktorijas laikmeta beigu posma ģimenes dzīvi, mīlestību, pārbaudījumiem un triumfu, kad ģimenes locekļiem jāizvēlas starp tradīcijām, ziedošanos, personīgo laimi un mīlestību.

programme.title: Domina
programme.desc: Gaja valdīšanas laiks, par kuru stāsta viņa sieva Līvija Drusilla, kura pilnībā mainīja izpratni par to, ko sievietes varētu gaidīt no dzīves, jo viņa kļuva par pasaules ietekmīgāko sievieti.
